name: Hide Woo Update Notices
author: vanMeerdervoort

sections.description:
Hide those irritating update notices by WooThemes and WooCommerce from the top of your admin screen.

Usage

Just install. It will work out of the box.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your blog
  2. Activate it
sections.faq:
Who are you?

I’m a musician – check my band Harmony Glen and designer, writing WordPress plugins now and then.

So you provide support?

Yes. Just send me an e-mail or put a post on the WordPress plugin support thingie. I will try and answer as soon as I can. But keep in mind I’ve put this plugin up here just because I think it could be useful to others too. I am really busy so it might take some time for me to reply!
